name: Kalei Witch
description:
CONTROLS:

A & D = Movement

W = Jump

I = Charge Red Color

O = Charge Blue Color

P = Charge Yellow Color

Spacebar = Cast Spell

TUTORIAL: The mechanic is very simple: Enemies from 12 different colours will spawn and come after you, you'll have to mix the three primary colours in order to cast the spell of the same colour of the enemy, that's the way to defeat them.
